lead_paragraph: Disgraced former grand slam doubles champion Bob Hewitt has been expelled from the International Tennis Hall of Fame due to his 2015 conviction for rape and sexual assault in South Africa.

headline.print_headline: Former Doubles Champion Bob Hewitt Expelled From Hall of Fame
headline.main: Former Doubles Champion Bob Hewitt Expelled From Hall of Fame
